metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4581 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Excel `.xll` add-in files did not have a blocklist entry in Firefox'sexecutable blocklist which allowed them to be downloaded without anywarning of their potential harm. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 117,Firefox ESR < 102.15, Firefox ESR < 115.2, Thunderbird < 102.15, andThunderbird < 115.2.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
